Trial_Design.evidence: A total of three hundred and eighty patients are to be randomised in two parallel groups

Participants.evidence: critically ill patients with an existing CVC

Intervention.evidence: compares the near-infrared light device to the landmark approach

Objective.evidence: The study objective is to compare the first-attempt success rate of PVC placement

Method_Outcome.evidence: first-attempt success rate of PVC placement

Randomisation_Allocation.evidence: randomised in two parallel groups with a stratification on centre and anticipated difficulty

Number_Randomised.evidence: A total of three hundred and eighty patients are to be randomised
